summary: kaitlyn granado , 24 , a teacher at macarthur high school in irving , was first arrested on march 19 for having an inappropriate relationship with a 15-year-old student , and was released on bail . now she has been arrested again after another pupil , also aged 15 , also accused granado of having sex with him on two consecutive nights in january . granado was arrested last month when she admitted kissing another boy , also 15 , and lettin him touch her breasts .
